definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以问书记官要一份执行表格。

sentences.english: Chen Qiufa was appointed Deputy Secretary of CPC Party Leadership Group of Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.
sentences.chinese: 陈求发任工业和信息化部党组副书记。

sentences.english: Jeremiah used a scribe to write for him.
sentences.chinese: 耶利米用书记员来为他记录。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents.
sentences.chinese: 这位书记官协助那位法官查阅有关判例。

sentences.english: Yanzhou Mining Group, Song, deputy secretary of Party Committee chaired the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 兖矿集团党委副书记宋国主持会议。

sentences.english: We elected him secretary of the Party branch.
sentences.chinese: 我们选举他为党支部书记。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents. Her breathing was assisted by a respirator.
sentences.chinese: 这位书记官协助那位法官查阅有关判例。

sentences.english: Cheng Donghong is the executive secretary of China Association for Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 程东红是中国科学技术协会书记处书记。

sentences.chinese: 程东红是中国科学技术协会书记处书记。

sentences.english: After the congress, the secretariat moved from Shanghai to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 代表大会召开之后，书记处由上海迁到了北京。

sentences.english: Registry accumulates junk files, and your computer's performance suffers.
sentences.chinese: 书记官处堆积的垃圾文件，计算机的性能受到影响。

sentences.english: Governor of Hunan Province Mei Kebao also attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 省委副书记梅克保参加会见。

sentences.english: He is just a flunky of the Party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 他不过是党支部书记的跟屁虫。

sentences.english: Now, Sun Wensheng has been appointed national secretary of the party group.
sentences.chinese: 现在，孙文盛已经被任命为国土资源部党组书记。

sentences.english: PS Wang meeting: Ambassador Huntsman called on Party Secretary Wang Yang and Mayor Wan at Zhudao this morning.
sentences.chinese: 大使今晨在珠岛宾馆与省委书记汪洋及万市长会面。

sentences.english: Dongshuji of green county with the transfer of the wounded, they take the pursuer.
sentences.chinese: 青顺县的董书记带着伤员转移，他们甩开了追军。

definition: head of provincial PRC government department
